A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was greatly disappointing as expectations were set high by the exciting trailers. The plots were scattered through the film and felt hollow. The continuity was off as well as the writing. Most of the character development were reversed back into how they started in the beginning of the film. The film dragged on as many of the plots could've been cut without making any effect on the rest of the movie. The movie was overall forgettable as it didn't satisfy Star Wars fans and didn't provide a cliffhanger or twist that left you wanting more. It didn't feel like a Star Wars movie but a science fiction Marvel spin off.
